Ključa u Napulju: Igrači se vratili pa opet otišli, spremaju se tužbe sa obe strane! Ančeloti danas odlazi?
Haos u klubu sa San Paola

06 Nov 2019

U Napoliju je sve eskaliralo, igrači i vlasnik kluba su u direktnom ratu, a trener je na strani ekipe. Do kraja dana bi Karlo Ančeloti mogao da napusti klupa Napolija. Ali ni to neće smiriti tenziju i elektricitet u klub...
Odluka gazde De Laurentisa da prošlog vikenda posle poraza od Rome naredi odlazak ekipe u karantin u sportski centar Kastel Voltorno do sledeće subote je teško pala igračima. Oni su nevoljno ispoštovali odluku De Laurentisa, a podržao ih je i trener Karlo Ančeloti koji se tako direktno zamerio poslodavcu.
Situacija se pogoršala sinoć kada su igrači posle remija sa Salcburgom svojevoljno odlučili da sa stadiona svako ode na svoju stranu i da se ne vraćaju u karantin gde je trebalo da ostane do subote i meča sa Đenovom. Kapiten Insinje je posle utakmice razgovarao rekao sa De Laurentisovim sinom Edijem i preneo mu stav ekipe:„Poruči tati da igrači idu kuću posle utakmice“, rekao je Insinje.
Takav potez igrača ja razbesneo De Laurentisa seniora, a Ančeloti se solidarisao sa igračima tako što se nije pojavio na obaveznoj konferenciji za medije i svima stavio do znanja da se u klubu nešto loše dešava. Doduše, on je sa svojim stručnim štabom otišao u karantin i ispoštovao želju predsednika, ali mu je otvoreno rekao da je protiv njegovog radikalnog poteza.
Igrači su se jutros opet pojavili u Kastel Voltornu, ali samo da odrade trening posle kojeg su se opet razišli i nisu ostali u karantinu. Treningu je prisustvovao sportski direktor Đuntoli, dok je De Laurentis pratio situaciju iz hotela u centru grada.
Napolijev gazda je već konsultovao advokatski tim kakve sve mere može da preduzme protiv igrača kako bi zaštitio imidž kluba i disciplinski pravilnik. Najavljuju se visoke novčane kazne za igrače koji su takođe konsultovali razne advokate i menadžere kako da se brane. Klub je oko 14.00 časova izdao saopštenje u kojem je poručio da će preduzeti sve pravne i zakonske mere da zaštiti svoje ekonomske, marketinške i sportske interese.
Ubrzo posle toga, Karlo Ančeloti je sa svojim saradnicima napustio trening centar u Kastel Voltornu. On bi prvi mogao da plati ceh. Moguće je da već do kraja dana kovertira neopozivu ostavku i napusti klub. Tako piše milanska Gazeta delo sport. Ako ga De Laurentis ne smeni pre nego što ovaj ponudi ostavku. Gazda kluba debelo zamera Ančelotiju izbor strane i stavljanje na stranu igrača.
Šta god da bude, Ančeloti ne mora da brine za budućnost jer bi ga mnogi klubovi rado videli na svojoj klupi, a poslednjih dana se sve više pominje senzacionalna mogućnost da Karleto sedne na klupu Boke Juniors koju za mesec dana očekuju predsednički izbori.
Što se navijača tiče, oni su na društvenim mrežama podeljeni i jedni pružaju podšrku ekipi, a drugi De Laurentisu. 
(FOTO: Reuters)

Naples Key: Players returned and left again, lawsuits ready on both sides! Anceloti leaving today?
Club chaos from San Paolo

06 Nov 2019

Everything has escalated in Napoli, the players and the club owner are in a direct war, and the coach is on the side of the team. By the end of the day, Carlo Ancelotti could leave Napoli's bench. But even that will not calm the tension and electricity in the club ...
The decision by Mrs De Laurentis to order the team to quarantine at the Castel Voltorno Sports Center last weekend after the defeat of Rome by next Saturday had a heavy fall on the players. They reluctantly complied with the decision of De Laurentis, and were supported by coach Carlo Ancelotti, who so directly resented the employer.
The situation worsened last night when the players, after a draw with Salzburg, voluntarily decided to leave the stadium for their part and not return to the quarantine, where they were supposed to stay until Saturday and play with Genoa. After the game, the captain of Insinje spoke with De Laurentis' son Eddie and conveyed to him the attitude of the team: "Tell Dad that the players are going home after the game," Insinje said.
That kind of player move made me angry with De Laurentis seniors, and Ancelotti solidified with the players by not appearing in a mandatory press conference and letting everyone know that something bad was going on at the club. Admittedly, he and his professional staff quarantined and respected the president's wishes, but openly told him that he was against his radical move.
The players showed up again at Castel Voltorne this morning, but only to do the training after which they split up again and did not quarantine. The training was attended by sports director Giuntoli, while De Laurentis monitored the situation from a downtown hotel.
Napoli's boss has already consulted a law team on what steps he can take against the player to protect the club's image and disciplinary rules. High fines are announced for players who have also consulted various lawyers and managers on how to defend themselves. At around 2 pm, the club issued a statement saying that it would take all legal and legal measures to protect its economic, marketing and sporting interests.
Shortly thereafter, Carlo Ancelotti and his associates left the training center in Castel Voltorne. He might be the first to pay the guild. It is possible that by the end of the day he will convert his irrevocable resignation and leave the club. This is how the Milan Gazette writes sport. Unless De Laurentis dismisses him before he resigns. The boss of the club vigorously resents Ancelotti's choice of side and player's side.
Whatever it is, Ancelotti does not have to worry about the future as many clubs would love to see him on their bench, and in recent days there has been a growing sensation of Carleto sitting on the Boke Juniors bench expected by the presidential election in a month.
As far as the fans are concerned, they are divided on social networks and some support the team and the other De Laurentis.
